title: "First Steps in Letterpress" now available in Paperback
content: Following a number of requests, I'm pleased to announce that my book for absolute beginners to letterpress "First Steps in Letterpress" is now available as a Paperback: [http://j.mp/10f3UmO](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013075759/http:/j.mp/10f3UmO "http://j.mp/10f3UmO")
author: MetalType
